@runnaky, @nexuswolf: That's barely a problem! Download and run MeGUI --> click on the 'One-click' button --> click on the 'Config' button --> click on the 'Encoding setup' tab --> click on the 'Don't encode video' check-box and then select the 'Audio Codec' of your choice (AC3 or AAC) and make sure below it it says 'encode audio: always' --> click on the 'Config' button and choose audio bitrate and channels and then OK everything. Audio encoding wouldn't take more than five minutes. Enjoy!
